verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* said \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Speak \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* say \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H1121"\w*, \w There|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* \w himself|strong="H5315"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w dead|strong="H5315"\w* \w among|strong="H5971"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*;

\w except|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w kin|strong="H7138"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w near|strong="H7138"\w* \w unto|strong="H1121"\w* \w him|strong="H3588"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* mother, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* brother,

\w and|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* sister \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w*, \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w near|strong="H7138"\w* \w unto|strong="H7138"\w* \w him|strong="H2930"\w*, \w that|strong="H1961"\w* hath \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* husband; \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w her|strong="H1961"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* \w himself|strong="H2930"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* \w himself|strong="H2930"\w*, \add being\add* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* chief \w man|strong="H1167"\w* \w among|strong="H5971"\w* \w his|strong="H2930"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w to|strong="H2490"\w* \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* \w himself|strong="H2930"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H7139"\w* \w baldness|strong="H7144"\w* upon \w their|strong="H3808"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w shave|strong="H1548"\w* \w off|strong="H1548"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w corner|strong="H6285"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* \w beard|strong="H2206"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H7139"\w* \w any|strong="H8295"\w* \w cuttings|strong="H8296"\w* \w in|strong="H1320"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w offerings|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* fire, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w*: \w therefore|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w woman|strong="H1644"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w profane|strong="H2491"\w*; \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w woman|strong="H1644"\w* \w put|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H3947"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* husband: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w unto|strong="H3947"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w Thou|strong="H1961"\w* shalt \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3588"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w offereth|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*: \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* thee; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w any|strong="H3588"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* \w herself|strong="H1931"\w* \w by|strong="H3588"\w* \w playing|strong="H2181"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w*, \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w profaneth|strong="H2490"\w* \w her|strong="H1931"\w* father: \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H3548"\w* \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* \w with|strong="H8313"\w* fire.

\w And|strong="H1419"\w* \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w that|strong="H3548"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* brethren, \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* whose \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w poured|strong="H3332"\w*, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w that|strong="H3548"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w consecrated|strong="H4390"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w put|strong="H3847"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* garments, \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w hair|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w go|strong="H3548"\w* \w loose|strong="H5921"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w rend|strong="H6533"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w clothes|strong="H3847"\w*;

\w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* go \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w body|strong="H5315"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* \w himself|strong="H5315"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* father, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* mother;

\w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w crown|strong="H5145"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3947"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wife \w in|strong="H3947"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w virginity|strong="H1331"\w*.

\w A|strong="H3068"\w* widow, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w divorced|strong="H1644"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w profane|strong="H2491"\w* \w woman|strong="H1644"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w*, \w these|strong="H3947"\w* \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w own|strong="H5971"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H5971"\w* wife.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w among|strong="H5971"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* sanctifieth \w him|strong="H3588"\w*.
\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1696"\w*,

\w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* Aaron, \w saying|strong="H1696"\w*, Whosoever \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H2233"\w* \w thy|strong="H7126"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w throughout|strong="H1755"\w* \w their|strong="H7126"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w hath|strong="H3971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w blemish|strong="H3971"\w*, \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w him|strong="H7126"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w approach|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H7126"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H2233"\w* \w his|strong="H7126"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w hath|strong="H3971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w blemish|strong="H3971"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w approach|strong="H7126"\w*: \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w lame|strong="H6455"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w hath|strong="H3971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* flat \w nose|strong="H2763"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w anything|strong="H3605"\w* \w superfluous|strong="H8311"\w*,
\w or|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man \w that|strong="H3027"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* broken-footed, \w or|strong="H3027"\w* broken-handed,

or crookbacked, or \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dwarf|strong="H1851"\w*, or \w that|strong="H5869"\w* \w hath|strong="H5869"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w blemish|strong="H8400"\w* \w in|strong="H5869"\w* \w his|strong="H5869"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w*, or \w is|strong="H5869"\w* \w scurvy|strong="H1618"\w*, or \w scabbed|strong="H3217"\w*, or \w hath|strong="H5869"\w* \w his|strong="H5869"\w* stones \w broken|strong="H4790"\w*;

\w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Aaron \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w blemish|strong="H3971"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w come|strong="H7126"\w* \w nigh|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w offerings|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* fire: \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w blemish|strong="H3971"\w*; \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H7126"\w* \w nigh|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w He|strong="H4480"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w his|strong="H4480"\w* God, \w both|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*:

\w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H5066"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w veil|strong="H6532"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H5066"\w* \w nigh|strong="H5066"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w blemish|strong="H3971"\w*; \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w sanctuaries|strong="H4720"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* sanctifieth \w them|strong="H6942"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* Aaron, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
